name: Brelyna's Practice
description: Brelyna asks you to be her test subject while she refines spells. The results range from helpful to humiliating to 'why am I suddenly glowing.'

objectives.text: Agree to help Brelyna practice (set boundaries).
Endure several practice effects (and manage misfires).
Help her stabilize the casting pattern under pressure.
Debrief and encourage Brelyna (or choose a colder path).

items: Brelyna's Focus Charm (narrative permission; minor stability aid)
rewards.notes: Unlocks Brelyna as companion and strengthens her Arcane Stabilizer reliability.

gm_notes: This is a great 'low-stakes high-character' quest. If the PC is noble/aspiring archmage, it also lets them play mentor.
